name: Hearts of Olympus
storyline:
Hidden away in a remote temple, you’ve spent your entire life alone, cursed with a Medusa-like aura that slowly turns those around you into stone. Feared by your family and village, you’ve never stepped outside—until the so-called hero Perseus storms in, bent on ending your life.

Just before Perseus can fulfill his mission, three gods—Ares, Hades, and Apollo—intervene, saving you from his blade. They insist on taking you on a journey to not only stop Perseus, but to unravel the mystery of your curse. Together, you’ll travel through vibrant Greek cities, the shadowy Underworld, and even the heights of Mount Olympus. Along the way, romance will blossom, but the literal barrier your curse imposes will be the ultimate test of the bonds you’ve formed.

With enemies closing in, gods manipulating the strings of fate, and your heart caught between three divine beings, your journey will be one of self-discovery, courage, and transformation. Will you conquer your curse, find true love, and rewrite your story among the gods? Your destiny awaits in this thrilling visual novel!
summary: Break your curse, battle mythic foes, and fall for the gods in an epic tale of love and destiny!
